root.name: Scourge: Outbreak
root.description: System RequirementsPCMinimumOperating System: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), or Windows 7Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2, or equivalent, running at 1.6 GHz or greaterMemory: 2 GBHDD Space: 5 GB availableVideo Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 256 MB of VRAM; NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GS, ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro 256 MB, or greaterSound card: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 16-bitConnection: Network Internet (TCP/IP) connectionRecommendedOperating System: Windows Vista (SP2), or Windows 7Processor: QuadCore 2.0 GHzMemory: (RAM) 2 GBHDD Space: 5 GB availableVideo Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 512MB of VRAM; NVIDIA GeForce GTX260, or ATI Radeon 4870Sound card: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 16-bitConnection: Network Internet (TCP/IP) connection
